001package ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.persistence;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.PersistencePort;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.capture.SegmentRecord;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessageEvent;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessagePair;
007import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.ByteStream;
008import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.FiveTuple;
009import ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.persistence.segment.SegmentBinIO;
010import java.nio.file.Path;
011import java.util.HashMap;
012import java.util.Map;
013
014/**
015 * Persists reconstructed message pairs using the legacy segment binary format.
016 * <p>Synthesizes TCP metadata to remain compatible with the historical pair viewer. Thread-safe via
017 * synchronized methods.</p>
018 *
019 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
020 */
021public final class LegacySegmentPersistenceAdapter implements PersistencePort {
022  private final SegmentBinIO.Writer writer;
023  private final Map<String, Long> nextSequence = new HashMap<>();
024
025  /**
026   * Creates a persistence adapter targeting the given directory.
027   *
028   * @param directory output directory for legacy segment binaries
029   * @throws IllegalStateException if the underlying writer cannot be created
030   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
031   */
032  public LegacySegmentPersistenceAdapter(Path directory) {
033    try {
034      this.writer = new SegmentBinIO.Writer(directory, "pairs", 1024);
035    } catch (Exception e) {
036      throw new IllegalStateException("Failed to initialize legacy segment writer", e);
037    }
038  }
039
040  /**
041   * Persists the request and response payloads for the provided pair, if present.
042   *
043   * @param pair message pair to persist; {@code null} is ignored
044   * @throws Exception if writing to disk fails
045   * @implNote Generates synthetic sequence numbers per flow direction to keep payload ordering.
046   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
047   */
048  @Override
049  public synchronized void persist(MessagePair pair) throws Exception {
050    if (pair == null) return;
051    persistEvent(pair.request());
052    persistEvent(pair.response());
053  }
054
055  private void persistEvent(MessageEvent event) throws Exception {
056    if (event == null) return;
057    ByteStream stream = event.payload();
058    if (stream == null || stream.data().length == 0) {
059      return;
060    }
061    SegmentRecord record = toSegmentRecord(stream);
062    writer.append(record);
063  }
064
065  private SegmentRecord toSegmentRecord(ByteStream stream) {
066    FiveTuple flow = stream.flow();
067    boolean fromClient = stream.fromClient();
068    String srcIp = fromClient ? flow.srcIp() : flow.dstIp();
069    int srcPort = fromClient ? flow.srcPort() : flow.dstPort();
070    String dstIp = fromClient ? flow.dstIp() : flow.srcIp();
071    int dstPort = fromClient ? flow.dstPort() : flow.srcPort();
072
073    byte[] payload = stream.data();
074    long sequence = nextSequence(srcIp, srcPort, dstIp, dstPort, fromClient, payload.length);
075
076    int flags = SegmentRecord.ACK;
077    if (payload.length > 0) {
078      flags |= SegmentRecord.PSH;
079    }
080
081    return new SegmentRecord(
082        stream.timestampMicros(),
083        srcIp,
084        srcPort,
085        dstIp,
086        dstPort,
087        sequence,
088        flags,
089        payload);
090  }
091
092  private long nextSequence(String srcIp, int srcPort, String dstIp, int dstPort, boolean fromClient, int length) {
093    String key = srcIp + ":" + srcPort + "->" + dstIp + ":" + dstPort + "#" + (fromClient ? "c" : "s");
094    long seq = nextSequence.getOrDefault(key, 0L);
095    nextSequence.put(key, seq + Math.max(0, length));
096    return seq;
097  }
098
099  /**
100   * Flushes pending records and closes the underlying writer.
101   *
102   * @throws Exception if flushing or closing fails
103   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
104   */
105  @Override
106  public synchronized void close() throws Exception {
107    writer.flush();
108    writer.close();
109  }
110}
